title: Hungry for It
overview: Hungry for It gives 10 aspiring cooks from all over the UK, all desperate to carve out a career in the food industry, a chance to skill up and put their talent to the test, with one amateur cook winning a life changing prize. The chefs will live together in a house, whilst competing and creating amazing dishes, in an attempt to impress industry experts and mentors.This exciting new competition plays out in two distinct spaces â€“ a restaurant and a street-food inspired pop-up.
